creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cup:  tall, cone-shaped foot; rounded bottom; straight sides; exterior has subtle incised vertical lines; saucer:  tall tapering base; bowl with fluted wavy edge; central pedestal with stamped diagonal lines around edge; pale blue glaze
title: Ch'ing-pai wine cup and saucer, one of a pair
